segments.text: Donna ! How are you ? It's good to hear your voice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Jack , it's always a pleasure doing business with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So how are things in the land of the free and the home of brave ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! And , how are things in your neck of the woods ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Things are so great here . I almost smiled myself to death last week . One of my coworkers had to give me CPR .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh.Jack , I have missed your sense of humor.Ha ha ha ! Nobody else sees things quite like you do.It ' s your gift .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nope , it's a gift.Anyway , we need some more of those mid-range speakers you tricked me into buying last time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That , my dear , was classic sales technique delivered by a professional .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you still gouging your customers the same price per unit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Heck no , we doubled the price , but because it's you , I'll let you have'em at 50 off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You silver-tongued devil . Can't you ever just answer a question with a simple yes or no ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I could , but where's the fun in that ?
segments.speaker: S1
